name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Patrick J. DePAUL, Appellant

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Patrick J. DePAUL, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County, Criminal Division, is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Edgar M. Snyder, Snyder & Gainor, P. A., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Dara A. DeCourcy, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
421 A.2d 207
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Patrick J. DePAUL, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 26, 1980.
Decided Nov. 3, 1980.
Edgar M. Snyder, Snyder & Gainor, P. A., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Robert E. Colville, Dist. Atty., Robert L. Eberhardt, Deputy Dist. Atty., Dara A. DeCourcy, Asst. Dist. Atty., Pittsburgh, for appellee.
